questions_1.question: Identify the correct statements about #4 or #5 seals.
Options: Leakage from #4 or #5 seals will be evident from the combustor drain.
The combustor drain is the smaller of the two side-by-side vertical drain tubes extending down from the forward end of the aft fairing.
The combustor drain is the larger of the two side-by-side vertical drain tubes extending down from the forward end of the aft fairing
Leakage from #4 or #5 seals will not be evident from the combustor drain.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Leakage from #4 or #5 seals will be evident from the combustor drain, The combustor drain is the smaller of the two side-by-side vertical drain tubes extending down from the forward end of the aft fairing."
